ARGUMENT
g

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isngp.n | |- N = ( norm ` G ) |
| 2 |  | isngp.z | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | isngp.d | |- D = ( dist ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elin | |- ( G e. ( Grp i^i MetSp ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ G e. MetSp ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( G e. ( Grp i^i MetSp ) /\ ( N o. .- ) C_ D ) <-> ( ( G e. Grp /\ G e. MetSp ) /\ ( N o. .- ) C_ D ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( g = G -> ( norm ` g ) = ( norm ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( g = G -> ( norm ` g ) = N ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( g = G -> ( -g ` g ) = ( -g ` G ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( g = G -> ( -g ` g ) = .- ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_coeq12d | |- ( g = G -> ( ( norm ` g ) o. ( -g ` g ) ) = ( N o. .- ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( g = G -> ( dist ` g ) = ( dist ` G ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( g = G -> ( dist ` g ) = D ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_sseq12d | |- ( g = G -> ( ( ( norm ` g ) o. ( -g ` g ) ) C_ ( dist ` g ) <-> ( N o. .- ) C_ D ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_df-ngp | |- NrmGrp = { g e. ( Grp i^i MetSp ) | ( ( norm ` g ) o. ( -g ` g ) ) C_ ( dist ` g ) } |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( G e. NrmGrp <-> ( G e. ( Grp i^i MetSp ) /\ ( N o. .- ) C_ D ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ G e. MetSp /\ ( N o. .- ) C_ D ) <-> ( ( G e. Grp /\ G e. MetSp ) /\ ( N o. .- ) C_ D ) ) |
| 17 | 5, 15, 16 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( G e. NrmGrp <-> ( G e. Grp /\ G e. MetSp /\ ( N o. .- ) C_ D ) ) |
